text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock So in other words because there are already high transmission  rates it doesn't matter! Cheers @MattHancock cause I wondered why we were ORDERED to stay home but NOT FOREIGNERS  makes total sense !NOT  create more infections yeah  way to go #COVID19
